name: Let's Dig
description:
If you want to know the history behind the development of this game click here.

This game was supposed to be released for the Godot Wild Jam 2 and you would dig around finding stuff. But instead in this game you can dig a single spot and talk to a single NPC. This game was made with the godot engine and i loved working on it, but i can't figure out how to make this game fun, so i'm publishing it as is, and moving on to another project, feel free to leave a suggestion in the comments section. Even if it is not completed i am proud of what i have done.

Subscribe to my mailing list if you want to know what i am going to do next.

This game was made using the Godot Engine, you will need it if you want to edit the project yourself.
